description: The nocturnal, prehistoric Asprete has teetered on the brink of extinction for decades.
title: Back from the dead: Race to save Romania's 65 million-year-old fish
title_page: Back from the dead: Race to save Romania's 65 million-year-old fish - BBC News
maintext: "It disappeared from the Raul Doamnei because there was no water any more. For one year the riverbed was almost dry," says Andrei Togor. "The communist plan didn't care about this endemic species. This fish is so rare because of humans."
